name: Toxel

conditions.value: its nature is Arrogant, Brave, Energetic, Grumpy, Hardy, Hasty, Naughty, Rash, Reckless, or Sassy
its nature is NOT Arrogant, Brave, Energetic, Grumpy, Hardy, Hasty, Naughty, Rash, Reckless, or Sassy

description: The Baby Pokémon. It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of electric damage equal to this Pokemon's proficiency bonus.

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot hold an item.
